meta.name: description
meta.content: Mount Airy School District is a K-12 public school district located in Mount Airy, North Carolina.

li.a: Handbooks, Code of Conduct, and Forms

div.p: Join in on the celebration of our teachers! We will be making a video to appreciate teachers and want YOUR input and creativity to be included. Click to see the several options for participation.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1024px; height: 505px;

section.p: Join in on the celebration of our teachers! We will be making a video to appreciate teachers and want YOUR input and creativity to be included. Click to see the several options for participation.
Your up-to-date spot for COVID-19 communications from the district along with resources for parents.
Mount Airy City Schools needs your help! The upcoming 2020-21 school year marks the 125th anniversary of Mount Airy City Schools.
Mr. Dalton Tedder, seventh-grade math and science teacher at Mount Airy Middle School has been selected to participate in High Point University’s Leadership Academy.

Schools have announced their 2020-2021 Teachers of the Year and Employees of the Year, while the district has named its Bus Driver of the Year, School Nutrition Employees of the Year, Central Office Employee of the Year, Beginning Teacher of the Year, and Principal of the Year.
